locations.title: What to see and visit:
des: - Explore the beautiful islands of Brijuni National Park, rich in natural beauty and cultural heritage.
- Discover the ancient Roman amphitheater in Pula, one of the best-preserved Roman amphitheaters in the world.

- Dive into the underwater world at Pula Aquarium, located near the city center. Explore various marine habitats, observe diverse aquatic species, and learn about the importance of marine conservation.

- Experience thrilling water slides, lazy rivers, and relaxing pools at Istralandia Aquapark, located near Novigrad. Perfect for families and water enthusiasts, this aquapark offers a fun-filled day for all ages.

Villa_Description.des: The villa is located in a quiet tourist settlement street of the city of Pula. It is 900 m away from the sea. The first main beach Verudela is excellent, only a 3-minute drive away. A café is 20 meters away and a shop is 100 meters away from the house. The house is extremely comfortable and stylishly furnished, adapted to modern way of life. It is available for 14 people + 2 extra beds. The interior space occupies 500 square meters and 2000 square meters of natural plot, which provides additional ambiance. The lawn features football goals, a trampoline, a swing, and a fireplace.
Villa_Description.subtitle: The Space
Villa_Description.des2: On the ground floor of the property is a spacious living area with a kitchen and dining room of modern design, leading to a large terrace of 100 square meters where garden furniture and a pavilion are located. Also on the ground floor is a wellness area, from which a view of the pool, terraces, and greenery is provided through large glass walls. The pool is 48 square meters in size, with a shallow area for children (0.5 meters deep) and a deeper area for adults (1.5 meters deep), equipped with hydro massage. The activity area extends through the entire basement of the house, with an additional kitchen and a fireplace that complements the experience. In the basement, there is also a garage with 2 parking spaces and 6 bicycles for city rides, while the fully fenced plot offers another 4 parking spaces. On the upper floor of the house, there is a study, 4 bedrooms with bathrooms, each with access to a terrace, and 1 attic room. The house is air-conditioned, and all rooms have central heating. In addition to the internal staircase, the floors are interconnected by an elevator. Large covered terraces further distinguish this property. The house is located near the marina, as well as all other interesting amenities, including the center of ancient Pula, which abounds in cultural and historical landmarks.
Villa_Description.des3: Guests can access 6 bedrooms, 2 living rooms, 2 kitchens, 8 bathrooms, balconies, terrace, beauty room, game room/summer kitchen, a room with a washing machine and ironing facilities, swimming pool, lawn, garden, children's playground and entire outdoor area.

Environs.title: Pula & Istria
Environs.des: In our neighborhood, there are many restaurants such as "Volaria" and the Fishermen's Hut in Marina Veruda, offering a rich seafood menu, Pizzeria Jupiter, Boccaporta restaurant offering traditional Istrian cuisine, as well as Pivnica na Rivi. You can rent bicycles, mopeds, boats, cars, etc. On the main beach Verudela, you can rent a sports field for mini-golf and badminton, tennis, surfing, and even a parasailing boat or a small airplane. There is also a diving club. Similarly, at Verudela, there is Bunarina, from where a boat departs every hour to Fratarski Island. Boat excursions: Brijuni Islands (National Park) - departure by boat from the town of Fažana, 5 km away from Pula, Journey to Green and Blue Istria (Wine Road - wine tasting, agritourism). Rovinj is 30 km away from Pula, where you can see Croatia in miniature and visit a large aquarium. The Feštinsko Kraljevstvo near Pula (interesting cave), Entertainment center in Pula Green Garden (paintball, karting), Barrel Equestrian Club in Pula, Nightlife: disco Pietas, disco Uljanik, disco Cargo, Terrace with live music at Verudela and Zlatne Stijene, Events: At the Forum, the main city square (traditional and modern dances as well as live music, and at the Arena Amphitheater (concerts, film festivals).
Environs.des2: You can reach the villa by car or taxi. Parking is free and available on site.
